title: Forty-eighth Commission Directive 85/157/EEC of 6 February 1985 amending the Annexes to Council Directive 70/524/EEC concerning additives in feedingstuffs
header:
FORTY-EIGHTH  COMMISSION DIRECTIVE
of 6 February 1985
amending the Annexes to Council Directive 70/524/EEC concerning additives in feedingstuffs
(85/157/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Annex II to Directive 70/524/EEC under part F 'Growth promoters' the indication under items 2 and 3 is hereby replaced by the following:
(1) OJ No L 270, 14. 12. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 297, 15. 11. 1984, p. 40.
